name: Divein Builder
author: Diveinwp

sections.description:
Divein Builder is a drag and drop page builder to create post and page content visually with a very lightweight user friendly interface.

Metallic Design Interface. The clean metallic design helps users to recognize containers, columns and elements.

Responsive design. Pages and posts created with Divein Builder will be automatically responsive. However it is possible to set responsive values for almost all design fields including column size.

Advanced design fields. With our advanced design fields it is possible to create pixel perfect design exactly like a psd design.

Export import. With Divein Builder it is possible to export a section of a page and import it to another page even in a different site. Any container section from our demos can be exported and imported to your site.
sections.installation:
1. Install using the WordPress built-in Plugin installer, or Extract the zip file and drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation.
  2. Activate the plugin through the \’Plugins\’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to Pages > Add New
  4. Choose \’Divein Builder\’ editor.
  5. Now you can add containers, columns and elements / order them using drag and drop interface / edit, delete, duplicate them using control menu.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Install using the WordPress built-in Plugin installer, or Extract the zip file and drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation.
  2. Activate the plugin through the \’Plugins\’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to Pages > Add New
  4. Choose \’Divein Builder\’ editor.
  5. Now you can add containers, columns and elements / order them using drag and drop interface / edit, delete, duplicate them using control menu.

short_description: Advanced drag and drop page builder plugin. Create pages and posts visually with any theme, any template, any design.
